detail_desc: Bag with a flap, zipped inner compartment and narrow, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Height 17 cm. Width 24 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in a linen and cotton weave with straps with an adjustable fastening on the front, elastication at the back of the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y). Lined.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.

Wide shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the back and shoulders, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-high boots in soft imitation suede with pointed toes and block heels. Loops at the top and decorative seams at the ankles. Satin linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Push-up bra in microfibre with decorative straps at the front and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Push-up microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and narrow, decorative straps at the front. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders and a flounce trim on the sleeves.
Flip-flops in imitation leather with square toes and heels. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.

prod_name: Pat ls bd oxford check buffalo
detail_desc: Checked shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke with a box pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Padded ski mittens in functional fabric with embossed rubber on the palms, and an adjustable hook and loop tab and elastication at the cuffs. Reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in slightly stretchy cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats at the front. Double yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a decorative belt and round plastic buckle at the waist and a high cut at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an airy, organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves with overlocked edges.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in patterned, organic cotton slub jersey. Shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Short, A-line skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and pockets in the side seams.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and gathered frills at the top. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.

Three-piece tracksuit set with a jacket, pair of trousers and T-shirt in fast-drying functional fabric. Jacket with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and short raglan sleeves.
Flared skirt in flock-print tulle with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft pointelle jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button placket, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a frill-trimmed yoke front and back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs that flare at the hem. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep neckline at the back.

Long-sleeved body in big-hole mesh with a small stand-up collar and opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips and a microfibre lower section with a lined gusset with press-studs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with decorative reverse-stitched seams at the front and centre back and ribbing with worn details around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Metal hoop earrings with a pendant in the shape of a snake with rhinestone eyes. Length 5 cm.
Vest tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket at the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Set with wings and a skirt. Lightly padded, glittery wings with elastic shoulder straps. Skirt in a double layer of tulle with a glittery elasticated waist and frill-trim at the hem. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a narrow, adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The bra is made partly from recycled polyester.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slight shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Spacious handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top. Three inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x36 cm.
Pre-tied bow tie in satin with an adjustable strap with a fastener at the back, and a matching handkerchief. Width of tie 11.5 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist.Crotch and side stripes in ventilating mesh. Jersey inner shorts.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Tapered fit.
Glasses chain in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 97 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in a cupro and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar, classic front and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. The shirt is made partly from recycled cupro.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Ankle boots in shiny leather with square toes, chunky heels and loops at the top. Leather linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back of the neck.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Knee-length, pleated dress with a rounded neckline, opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

Long, padded parka in cotton twill with a stand-up collar with press-studs, and a lined, padded hood with a foldover edge. Zip and button band with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Concealed inner ribbing at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide flounce around the neckline and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a boat neck and dropped shoulders.
Metal earrings with a small asymmetric disc at the top and a large twisted metal hoop with a tortoiseshell-patterned plastic pendant in the middle. Length 4.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with slits in the sides.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey.
Chunky-knit jumper in a soft wool and mohair blend with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Dungaree dress in soft, lightweight, stretch corduroy with adjustable straps, press-studs at the sides, and side and back pockets. Lined at the top.
